ADDRESS_ADDED: The new address has been registered successfully!
ADDRESS_DELETE_PRIMARY:
Sorry, the address you are trying to delete is set as primary.
Please set a new primary address to delete this one.
ADDRESS_DELETED: The address has been deleted from your profile.
ADDRESS_NOT_ADDED: Some error occurred while creating the new address
ADDRESS_UPDATED: The address has been updated successfully!
ALREADY_REPORTED: You have already reported this review.
BLOCKED_BY_ADMIN: Sorry, your account has been blocked by the admin.
SENT_OTP: OTP has been sent to your registered email address.
MAIL_SENT: Your password has been sent to your email address.
DEACTIVATE_BY_ADMIN: Sorry, your account has been deactivated by the admin.
MULTI_SHOPS_IN_CART:
There are some products from another shop in your cart.
This will be considered as a separate order
EXISTS_PHONE:
Sorry, the specified phone number is already registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
EXISTS_EMAIL:
Sorry, the specified email is already registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
EXISTS_ITEM:
Sorry, the specified item can not be deleted.
Remove the corrosponding items first then delete.
EXIST_USERNAME:
Sorry, the specified username is already registered in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
EXISTS_GOAL:
Sorry, the specified goal can not be deleted.
Remove the corrosponding goal first then delete.
EXPIRED_VERIFICATION:
Sorry! Your phone number couldn't be verified.
Because the verification took too long. Please try again.
FAILED_DB_CONNECTION: Error occurred while trying to connect to the database.
FAILED_LOGIN:
Sorry, the phone number / password combination is not valid. Please try again.
If the problem persists, kindly call support.
FAILED_REGISTRATION:
Sorry, there was an error during the registration.
Please try again. If the problem persists, kindly call support.
FAILED_VERIFICATION_MAX_ATTEMPTS:
Sorry! Your phone number could not be verified.
You entered wrong code too many times. Please contact our support team.
FAILED_VERIFICATION:
Sorry, your number could not be verified.
Please try again. If the problem persists, kindly call support.
GENERAL: We're sorry! Something went wrong with the request. Please try again later.
INVALID_PASSWORD: Sorry, the password you entered is not valid. Please try again.
INVALID_PARAMETERS: Sorry, the request could not be processed as because of invalid parameters.
INVALID_PHONE: Sorry! The specified phone number is invalid.
INVALID_TOKEN_VERIFICATION: Sorry! The verification token is invalid.
ITEM_ALREADY_EXIST: Sorry, the specified data already exists.
ITEM_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the item
ITEM_NOT_DELETED: Some error occurred while deleting the item
ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested resource could not be found!
SHOP_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested shop could not be found!
CATEGORY_NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested category could not be found!
ITEM_NOT_RETRIEVED: Some error occurred while retrieving the item
ITEM_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while updating the item
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: Method doesn't exist or is not allowed.
USER_NOT_APPROVED:
Sorry! Your account is not approved yet.
Please contact our support team.
NOT_ALLOWED:
Sorry, the action you tried to perform is not allowed.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
NOT_AUTHORIZED: Sorry, you are not authorized to perform this action.
NOT_FOUND:
Sorry, no entry could be found for the specified criteria.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
OUT_OF_STOCK: This product is out of stock
PASSWORD_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while changing the password
PRODUCT_APPROVED: Please fill up add product request form and it will approve within 24 hours
PRODUCT_MAX_PRICE: Sorry, You can't enter higher value given from  product price
PRODUCT_REVIEW_ADDED: Thank you for providing feedback for the product. It has been registered successfully.
PRODUCT_REVIEW_DELETED: Your product review has been deleted.
PRODUCT_UPDATE_APPROVED: Please fill update product requestform and it will approve with in 24hours
SHOP_ALREADY_EXISTS:
Sorry, You have already registered one shop in the system.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
SUPPORT_TICKET_CREATED: New support ticket genrated and Via email and support Center We will get back to you within 24 hours
USER_LIMIT_MAX_ADDRESS: You filled all the available address slots. To add a new address, delete one of the old ones.
USER_NOT_EXIST: User does not exist in the system
VENDOR_NOT_FOUND: Vendor does not exist in the system
